casebody.data:
Shirley D. PILES
v.
ALLSTATE INSURANCE COMPANY and Ricky McGhee. No. 603P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 11, 2008. Margaret P. Eagles, for Insurance Company, et al. Marie Lang, Durham, for Piles. Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 653 S.E.2d 181 .

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 19th day of December 2007 by Defendants in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 11th day of June 2008."
